h1: How Many Calories in a Burger Patty?
assumptions: Standard 4-oz (113 g) ground beef patty, 80/20 lean-to-fat ratio, grilled without added oil, no bun or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by meat type, fat content, cooking method, and size; check labels or use a tracker for precision.

quick_answer.text: A standard grilled burger patty contains about 290 kcal and 25 g protein.

faqs.q: How many calories in a burger patty?
faqs.a: About 290 kcal for a standard 4-oz 80/20 grilled beef patty.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a burger patty?
faqs.a: Roughly 25 g protein per standard patty.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect burger patty calories?

faqs.q: How does fat content change calories in a burger patty?
faqs.a: Leaner patties (90/10) have ~190 kcal vs. 290 kcal for 80/20.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in a plain burger patty?
faqs.a: No carbs, fiber, or sugars in a plain beef patty.
